channel.title: sleep on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in sleep on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: Home Remedies from south India: Fertility and reproductive troubles
item.description: This is a continuation of the series which started with Hair Care. The other posts covered Eye care, Coughs, Digestive disorders, Head aches, and Skin Care among other topics.

item.title: LOG 1.22 Boats :)
item.description: 12th July, 2011 Hello, I hope all of you have been well. Life has improved significantly for me since I organised it. I now feel like I have a sense of purpose and

item.title: LfE 13: The last day and the Bicycle story
item.description: 06/12/2009 Hello! It’s nearly noon on this bright sunshiny Sunday. The temperature is 8 Degrees Celsius. Last night it hit an unusual 9 degrees! I had planned to pull out my gloves only after December started but I remember November days being colder than this!

item.title: LfE 6: Classes are Intense
item.description: 04/10/2009 Hello everyone! The weather this week albeit two days in the middle has been pleasant with sunny blue skies. This is most unexpected in Edinburgh but a joy to us although the wind can be a real bully while walking; pushing us forward and backward with no warning!

item.title: Android body vs Human body
item.description: A lot of futuristic science fiction puts forward several ideas of what an android would be like. Data from Star Trek (TNG) is an intriguing character who tries very hard to understand what it is to be human.
